cards.title: Print Spooler not running, exposing printing security and reliability risks until resolved.
cards.explanation: This card indicates 'Print Spooler not running, exposing printing security and reliability risks until resolved.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

troubleshooting.overview: This card indicates 'Print Spooler not running, exposing printing security and reliability risks until resolved.'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

scenarios.title: Potential Issue – Generic misconfiguration
steps: Use Evidence to target failing component; review services, logs, and policies.
